name: Obsidian Bull
flavor_text: A hand cannon fed from a cylinder.

name: Wasteland Condor
flavor_text: A powerful handgun with an extremely heavy cartridge.

name: Amber Bull
flavor_text: A revolver made to fire low caliber rounds.

name: M10
flavor_text: A small, low caliber, semiautomatic pistol. Very light and decently easy to conceal.

name: mOP-3
flavor_text: A hand-sized 20mm, breech loading, grenade launcher.
special_rules: Damage, AP and effects depend on ammunition; 10m minimum arming distance

name: Little Lucifer
flavor_text: A one-handed liquid propellant. While it is knows as a flame thrower, it can be used for all fueled spray weapons.

name: OH-VLS
flavor_text: A small laser pistol. Adjustable, conceilable and lightweight.

name: Newton Pistol Mk2
flavor_text: The smallest mass drivers ever built. Shoots very small metal fragments.

name: Newton Pistol Mk5
flavor_text: A forearm-sized magnetic accelerator shooting metal fragments.

name: Mk1 Shock Pistol
flavor_text: A modified taser. Very much lethal.

name: Scattershock
flavor_text: A wide-arcing shock pistol.

name: MS Shotgun
flavor_text: A double-barrel shotgun with shortened barrels to facilitate pellet spread.

name: SBAR-22
flavor_text: A rifle caliber fired from a short system. Warning: only buy this if you don’t own a dog!

name: MP15
flavor_text: A pistol caliber fired from a small rifle frame.

name: Thumper
flavor_text: A small CQC grenade launcher meant for utility grenades. Exists as an under barrel version for rifles.
special_rules: Damage, AP and effects depend on ammunition; 10m minimum arming distance

name: OH-VLS Conversion
flavor_text: A conversion kit to turn an OH-VLS into a small laser carbine.

name: Newton Pistol Repeater
flavor_text: A conversion kit for low powered Newton Pistols to increase fire rate.

name: Scatter Rail
flavor_text: A small mass driver with increased bore and decreased barrel length to achieve shotgun-like ballistics.

name: Crossbow
flavor_text: A medieval weapon with a trigger, accelerating sharp sticks.

name: Scattershock Conversion
flavor_text: A conversion kit for the Scattershock to feed from larger fuel cells. Increases size, mag size and range.

name: AR-22
flavor_text: A full-sized, modular rifle platform, used often and by a variety of people and for a variety of situations.

name: M282 SSW
flavor_text: A bulky, belt-fed fire support weapon with high ammunition capacity.

name: Mk3 Tankgewehr
flavor_text: An insanely high-caliber, long barrel rifle made to fight heavy armor. Carries a lot of energy over comparatively small distances.

name: A3R
flavor_text: The "Makar Advanced Anti-Armor Rifle": A long range rifle made to take out high value targets or light armor. Not an overly clever name but don’t tell the snipers.

name: M5 Shotgun
flavor_text: A scattergun with a tube magazine firing multiple pellets per shot.

name: OP-2
flavor_text: A 20mm single shot grenade launcher with increased barrel length.
special_rules: Damage, AP and effects depend on ammunition; 10m minimum arming distance

name: Rathalos
flavor_text: A flame thrower with an integrated tank to profit from familiar, proven rifle ergonomics.

name: BR-56
flavor_text: A semiautomatic laser rifle.

name: Incinerator Rifle
flavor_text: A long range laser rifle. Instead of piercing through armor it burns it away.

name: M4 Silver Crow
flavor_text: A handheld, semi automatic mass driver. Very powerful but decently mobile.

name: R235 SSW
flavor_text: A fully automatic mass driver, for when squad support is two rooms over.

name: R13 Armor Cracker
flavor_text: A handheld, long range mass driver

name: FG-9
flavor_text: A rifle firing high energetic, self-stabilized plasma that destabilizes and explodes on impact. The energy release is highly unpredictable.

name: Choke M3 Arc Rifle
flavor_text: An arc rifle with comparatively little spread to increase range.

name: Choke F3 Arc Thrower
flavor_text: An arc rifle with a large spread made for crowd suppression.

name: M2 Brass Storm
flavor_text: A high-caliber machine gun with notoriously high fire-rate.

name: M36 Chain Cannon
flavor_text: A heavy machine gun with an external cycler. Reduced fire rate when compared to the M2 but renowned for unrivaled reliability. It is extremely heavy and cannot reasonably be called portable.

name: RM4 Chain Shotgun
flavor_text: An automatic, belt fed shotgun known for its high maintenance need.

name: Forge Fire
flavor_text: A large flamethrower made for vehicles and emplacements

name: Slicer
flavor_text: A vehicle laser cannon, powerful enough to break bunker doors. Requires a massive power source to equalize its needs and is overly affected by refraction, limiting its range.

name: Model 6 Gladiator
flavor_text: A heavy mass driver sporting 5 rotating accelerators to prevent overheating and increase fire rate.

name: Mag Rail Cannon
flavor_text: A massive mass driver built for anti armor LAVs in the days of war.

name: Zeushammer
flavor_text: Also referred to as the "Ball Lightning Cannon" this weapon is a long range Tesla cannon firing arcing ball lightnings.

name: MML-4
flavor_text: A multi rocket launcher built for vehicles
special_rules: Damage, AP and effects depend on ammunition; Powered; Backblast (4)

name: WTFBRR
flavor_text: A massive recoilless rifle made for giant loads to be fired from vehicles
special_rules: Damage, AP and effects depend on ammunition; Backblast (8)

name: Hail Fire
flavor_text: A micro missile launcher firing multiple rockets on multiple targets simultaneously

name: M64
flavor_text: A 40mm rotary grenade launcher
special_rules: Damage, AP and effects depend on ammunition; 10m minimum arming distance; Single Loader

name: ERPG
flavor_text: A rocket propelled grenade launcher
special_rules: Damage, AP and effects depend on ammunition; Backblast (4)

name: OP-4
flavor_text: A 40mm breech loading grenade launcher
special_rules: Damage, AP and effects depend on ammunition; 15m minimum arming distance

name: Thunderstrike
flavor_text: A grenade launcher fed from a belt. Very useful for crowd control but complete overkill in most situations. It is also extremely cumbersome due to the massive belt or belt box, much too large to be used on foot.
special_rules: Damage, AP and effects depend on ammunition; 15m minimum arming distance

name: Collapsible Bow
flavor_text: A bow that can be collapsed to fit small cases for transportation and concealment.

name: Recurve Bow
flavor_text: A full-sized bow with heavy draw.
special_rules: Silenced; Suffers a penalty to hit equal to the user’s strength below 40.

name: Asphyxiation Grenade
flavor_text: A chemical weapon that burns away oxygen in a living room sized area. This reaction is not strongly exothermic, making it hard to detect before it’s too late.

name: EMP grenade
flavor_text: Very expensive and very rare, this new type of explosive stuns or even damages unshielded electronics. It also causes piezoelectric exoskeletons to spasm and hurt the wearer.

name: Flashbang
flavor_text: Popular among law enforcement personnel this non-lethal grenade blinds and deafens anyone not wearing appropriate protective gear with a loud bang and bright flash.

name: Frag Grenade
flavor_text: An explosive that spreads a large amount of shrapnel in a decently large area. Used against groups of hostiles and to clear rooms since the dawn of gunpowder.

name: Incendiary Grenade
flavor_text: A fire-based explosive known to be easy and cheap to improvise and to cause a lot of collateral damage. Less useful against energy shielding and metal constructions.

name: Riot Foam
flavor_text: A canister of sticky foam that heavily impairs movement of everyone caught up in it. Can safely but slowly be burnt away at low temperatures.

name: Smoke Grenade
flavor_text: Favored in open places this non-lethal grenade grants a large amount of artificial concealment to otherwise clear lines of fire.

name: Tear Gas Grenade
flavor_text: Non-lethal irritant grenades usually employed to stop riots.
special_rules: Blast (8); Smoke; Stun (0); Stun is applied every round in the Smoke

name: Blunt Throwing Weapon
flavor_text: Blunt instruments like rocks and bottles being thrown. Very common when nothing else is at hand.

name: Throwing Axe
flavor_text: Sharp, heavy, bladed weapon weighted for throwing

name: Throwing Knives
flavor_text: Sharp, bladed weapons weighted for throwing

name: Bear Trap
flavor_text: A strong, spring loaded clamp made to injure legs and stop creatures from fleeing or approaching.

name: C-7
flavor_text: A block of plastic explosives. Usually made to be set up but can the thrown in a pinch.

name: Cloak Mine
flavor_text: A landmine with an integrated cloaking field. Makes an obvious noise when stepped upon and takes a decent amount of time to arm for safety reasons.
special_rules: Blast (3); detecting the noise when stepped upon takes a +0 Perception test

name: Exploding Small Fuel Cell
flavor_text: A small fuel cell, usually built very sturdily, may be rigged as an improvised explosive device. Unstable cells however may explode when handled too roughly in high temperatures.

name: Exploding Medium Fuel Cell
flavor_text: A fuel cell, usually built very sturdily, may be rigged as an improvised explosive device. Unstable cells however may explode when handled too roughly in high temperatures.

name: Exploding Large Fuel Cell
flavor_text: A large fuel cell, usually built very sturdily, may be rigged as an improvised explosive device. Unstable cells however may explode when handled too roughly in high temperatures.
